name: Gigalith
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.

abilities.name: High Density Armor
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has full HP, any damage done to this Pokémon by an opponent’s attack is reduced by 50 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Overdrive Smash
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Overdrive Smash attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
